top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
Who would have thought pop-funk would translate to metal so well! The riffage! The three of you together is quite something! Making Phil Collins creepy...Hotel California... just...wow! MORE!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Wow this was really damn horrible.. Daria Zaritkskaya  also did it but both of you was lit 🔥in other ways
I feel like the guitar chords should punch more. I don't know if it's the production or lack of bass, but it feels lacking.
FYI song works well to perform CPR to.... as does Another One Bites the Dust....
